thread.section_title: Holiday Inn Manhattan - Financial District - UPDATED 2017 Hotel Reviews & Price Comparison (New York City) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Visiting for the First Time from Texas
thread.title_full: Visiting for the First Time from Texas - Review of Holiday Inn Manhattan - Financial District, New York City, NY - TripAdvisor

author: Nicole W
title: Visiting for the First Time from Texas
text: We were unsure this would be a good fit for us, but we can happily say, this was an excellent hotel in a perfect location. The room was comfortable, as were the beds. Most of the staff were very friendly and helpful. The tavern located inside the hotel had an excellent breakfast with friendly staff. We would definitely recommend this hotel to our family and friends.
